Info

Defines class Opener with attribute(s) and method(s). Creates a custom URL opener with specific handlers for HTTP and HTTPS requests, including proxy handling and error processing.

class testspeednet.net.utils.opener.Opener[source]¶

Bases: object

Defines class Opener with attribute(s) and method(s). Creates a custom URL opener with specific handlers for HTTP and HTTPS requests, including proxy handling and error processing.

It defines:

attributes:
_TOOL_VERBOSE - Console text indicator for process-phase.
methods:
build_opener - Creates and returns a custom URL opener.
_TOOL_VERBOSE: str = 'TEST_SPEED_NET::NET::UTILS::OPENER'¶
classmethod build_opener(timeout: int | None = 10) → OpenerDirector[source]¶

Creates and returns a custom URL opener.

Builds an OpenerDirector with handlers for proxy handling, HTTP and HTTPS request handling, error processing, and redirection. It also sets a custom user agent.

Parameters:

timeout (<Optional[int]>) – Maximum allowed time for opening connection

Returns:

A custom opener

Return type:

<OpenerDirector>

Exceptions:

None
